ImperiumCardMaker.Download Not Supported: Download not supported yet, you can use print screen key.
ImperiumCardMaker.Copy the code into the text: Copy the code into the text
ImperiumCardMaker.Name: Name
ImperiumCardMaker.Suit Icon: Suit Icon (first suit is also banner colour)
ImperiumCardMaker.Exhaust Count Settings Unavailable: To customize exhaust count, first set the banner to POWER.
ImperiumCardMaker.Default Exhaust Count Is Five: Default is 5, other values would be shown.

CardGroup.hintIfNoCardsLine2: Pick at least one Nation / Common. You may change your filter settings.
CardGroup.hintIfNoCardsLine3: In filter settings, N/A represents cards with none of these icon,
CardGroup.hintIfNoCardsLine4: while each other icon represents cards with at least one of such icon.
CardGroup.hintIfNoCardsLine5: For example, Civilised(suit) would include cards with Uncivilised/Civilised suit.
